item.title: Modern Infrastructure – Part 1: Docker
item.description:
“Build once, run anywhere.” That’s not a dream — that’s Docker.

In this post, we’ll break down Docker from the ground up. Whether you’re a beginner or brushing up for deployment, this is your one-stop guide to Docker and its ecosystem.

🐳 What is Docker?

Docker is an open-source platform that allows you to develop, ship, and run applications inside containers. Containers package your app along with its environment, dependencies, and tools — making them portable, lightweight, and consistent across all platforms.
